DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect AZD1236 patient cystic fibrosis ( CF ) inflammatory biomarkers induce sputum , treatment period 4 week .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy AZD1236 Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure Have clinical diagnosis cystic fibrosis FEV1 > 40 % predict normal Be able comply induce sputum procedure postmenopausal surgically sterile female ( total hysterectomy /or bilateral total oophorectomy ) Concomitant diagnosis significant pulmonary disease CFrelated lung disease , include symptomatic asthma allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis Treatment immunomodulatory agent within 8 week prior Visit 2 Known infect Burkholderia cepacia
